mapper.select: SELECT A.ANAL_NO, A.SIMUL_NO, A.COMP_SIMUL_NO, A.IX_CD, A.ANAL_DATA, A.TARGET_CRP_NO, A.ANAL_DT, B.FILE_NM FROM SHRP_ANAL_HST A, SHRP_SIMLATN_HST B WHERE A.SIMUL_NO IN ( SELECT SIMUL_NO FROM SHRP_SIMLATN_HST ORDER BY SIMUL_NO DESC LIMIT 10 ) AND A.SIMUL_NO = B.SIMUL_NO ORDER BY A.ANAL_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHRP_ANAL_HST ( SIMUL_NO, IX_CD, ANAL_DATA, TARGET_CRP_NO ) VALUES ( #{simulNo}, #{ixCd}, #{analData}, #{targetCrpNo} )
